remarks:
The double class union of a Cartesian product is included in the union of its arguments.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2006.) 

---

 The double class union of a cross product is included in the union of its arguments.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2006.)
statement: unixpss $p |- U. U. ( A X. B ) C_ ( A u. B ) $.
